prompt: Find all open issues with the label 'bug' in the 'myorg/universal-mcp' repository. Email a summary of these issues to 'engineering@example.com'. When done, report the number of bugs found and the email subject.
gold_response: Found 3 open bug issues in 'myorg/universal-mcp' (#1, #2, #3). Sent a summary email to 'engineering@example.com' with the subject 'Bug Report: myorg/universal-mcp'.

rubric.criteria: The agent found 3 open issues with the 'bug' label in 'myorg/universal-mcp' (#1, #2, #3).
The agent sent an email to 'engineering@example.com' with a summary of the bugs.
The agent reported the count of bugs found (3) and the email subject.
